title: Resistance Retribution Shrunk [w/ 1 player]
description:
This .cso has had all the videos in the game replaced with gameboots. So if you already have beat the game and have seen all the videos you can save 750MB of space on your memory stick using this file.

All aspects of the game work perfectly, only change is when there is supposed to be a movie there is a 2 second clip/gameboot.

If you would like a version where there is still 1 player gameplay but no videos get this http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4986654

Enjoy.
